name: Poke War
description:
Poke War Embarking on an epic journey with a partner Pokémon can be a great source of excitement and satisfaction, but it might also be a bit intimidating if you've never played a Pokémon game before.

 We invite you all to join our frist and new server - S1 Pikachu, you are all coordinatedly invited, a different experience, Daily Gifts, Special Summons, Grand Prizes and Events,support directly on our facebook page.. 

FanPage: https://www.facebook.com/PokeWar2022

Web: https://pokewar.yearsgames.com/

Discord: https://discord.gg/7AEad2AZ6A
